name: Teen Titans GO! Fan Game
description:
Play as Robin, Starfire, Raven, Cyborg, and Beast Boy and help them save Jump City (and their video game time) from certain doom!
Based on the hit Cartoon Network show, play through familiar scenery and battle against a cast of the Titans enemies!
If you're using a Keyboard
WASD to move  || P to Pause ||  Space for Action
Or if you're using a controller
D-Pad to move || A Button to Jump || X Button for Action || Start Button to Pause
